multiplechoiceresponse.p: In Trainingland, select a facility-level organisation unit, the RMNCAH data set and a period of your choice in the Data Entry app. In the RMNCAH data set, filter to the ‘Delivery by age’ section of the form. Enter the word “Ten” in one of the fields.

label.h3: What does the error message say?

choicegroup.choice: “Value must be zero or a positive integer”
“Invalid value type, change to zero or positive integer value”

div.p: If you enter a data value that doesn’t match the predefined value type for that element, such as text, characters or decimals, DHIS2 will display an error message with information about the required data value type. In this case, the data value must be a zero or positive integer.
